terms.title: Terms of Use and Privacy Policy
terms.subtitle: Last updated: 07/21/2024
terms.notificationsContent: This permission allows digiKUNTZ Payments to send you notifications about events you're registered for, important updates, and personalized offers.
terms.justificationContent: These notifications help you not to miss important events and stay informed about the latest news.
terms.cameraAccessContent: This permission allows digiKUNTZ Payments to access your device's camera to scan ticket QR codes at events.
terms.justificationCamera: This feature is essential to facilitate your access to events by scanning your ticket.
terms.privacyPolicyIntro: This privacy policy describes how digiKUNTZ Payments collects, uses, and protects your personal information when you use our website and mobile application.
terms.collectedInfoIntro: We collect different types of information to provide you with our services:
terms.name: Full name
terms.provideServiceDesc: Manage your account and enable access to our features
terms.personalizeDesc: Adapt content and recommendations to your preferences
terms.communicateDesc: Inform you about updates and relevant events
terms.improveDesc: Analyze usage to optimize the application
terms.securityDesc: Protect your account and our services
terms.permissionsIntro: To function properly, the application requires certain permissions:
terms.googleCalendarDesc: This permission allows the application to sync your events with your Google Calendar.
terms.googleCalendarJustification: This feature is essential to help you manage your events efficiently and receive reminders.
terms.marketingConsentDesc: I agree to receive marketing communications and event updates
terms.analyticsConsentDesc: I agree to have my usage data collected to improve the application
terms.calendarConsentDesc: I agree to sync with my Google Calendar
terms.dataUsage: We collect the following data when you register and use digiKUNTZ Payments:
terms.dataUsageSubtitle: The collected data is used for:
terms.endTerms: By signing up for digiKUNTZ Payments, you agree to these privacy clauses, terms, and user data usage policy.
terms.policyP1: We reserve the right to modify this privacy policy at any time. Changes will be posted on this page, and the update date will be indicated at the top of the policy. We encourage you to regularly review this page to stay informed about potential changes.
terms.cookiesP1: We use cookies to enhance your experience on digiKUNTZ Payments. Cookies allow us to remember your preferences and provide personalized service. You can configure your browser to refuse cookies, but this may affect certain features of the platform.
terms.userRight3: Request the deletion of your data
terms.userRightEnd: To exercise these rights, please contact us at:
terms.dataSharing2: Comply with legal and regulatory obligations
terms.dataSecurityP1: We take the security of your data very seriously. We use technical and organisational security measures to protect your information from unauthorized access, disclosure, modification, or destruction.
terms.usage1: Create and manage your user account
terms.usage2: Facilitate the creation and management of events
terms.usage3: Improve our services and user experience
terms.usage4: Send you notifications and updates about your events
terms.usage5: Ensure the security of our users and the platform
terms.eventData: Information about events you create, manage, or participate in
terms.dataSharingSubtitle: Your personal data will never be sold to third parties. However, we may share your information with trusted partners who adhere to our privacy policy to:
terms.p1: Welcome to digiKUNTZ Payments, your money transfer platform. By using our services, you agree to the following terms and conditions, as well as our privacy policy.
terms.termsMessage: By creating an account, you agree to our terms of use and privacy policy.

apidoc.headParagraphe: With digiKUNTZ Payments, you benefit from a complete payment ecosystem that allows you to create and manage direct payment links, subscription plans, fundraising campaigns, as well as the sale of digital or physical products and services.
apidoc.introP1: Beyond its features, digiKUNTZ Payments provides a robust and secure payment API that allows you to connect your digiKUNTZ Payments account to your own third-party applications, websites, or business systems. This integration enables you to initiate transactions, collect payments, and centralize all your financial flows into a single account.
apidoc.introP2: Designed to meet the needs of developers and businesses, the digiKUNTZ Payments API offers high integration flexibility, simplified payment management, and a high level of reliability. It is suitable for both small-scale projects and high-volume transaction applications while ensuring a smooth payment experience for end users.
apidoc.introP3: The digiKUNTZ Payments API allows developers and businesses to easily, securely, and flexibly integrate the platform’s payment services into their applications, websites, or business systems.
apidoc.introP4: This API exposes a set of endpoints that allow payment initiation (pay-in), transaction status tracking, balance consultation, and management of access keys required for request authentication. It is designed to centralize all financial flows into a single account while ensuring traceability, reliability, and security of operations.
apidoc.introP5: The documentation presents the available endpoints, their HTTP methods, required parameters, request formats, and associated authentication mechanisms. API exchanges are performed in JSON format and rely either on JWT token authentication or on the use of a userId and secretKey pair, depending on the endpoint type.
apidoc.introP6: Whether you are building a one-time payment application, a subscription system, or a high-volume transaction platform, the digiKUNTZ Payments API adapts to your needs and provides a reliable foundation for building scalable and high-performance payment experiences.
apidoc.accountCreationParagraph: Only Organization-type accounts are eligible to obtain payment APIs. This account type provides access to advanced features required for integrating and operating payment services via API.
apidoc.idVerificationParagraph: You must complete the identity verification process from your Profile area. Alternatively, the required documents may be submitted by email to contact@yaba-in.com.
apidoc.idDoc1: Your digiKUNTZ Payments account ID visible on the Profile page
apidoc.idDoc3: A commitment letter certifying that the API will not be used for illegal purposes
apidoc.idDoc4: A tax clearance certificate issued within the last three months
apidoc.idVerificationDelay: A response will be provided within a maximum of 72 hours after receipt and validation of the documents.
apidoc.apiKeyActivationParagraph: Once your account is validated, go to your developer space and activate your API key. This activation allows third-party applications to initiate transactions from your digiKUNTZ Payments account. You are responsible for keeping your API keys secure.
apidoc.createPayment: Create a payment (pay-in) via the API
apidoc.historyParagraph: View your transaction history from your dashboard on the My Transactions page. Transactions initiated via the API are marked as ApiCall.

portal.title: Portal
portal.messageOnDesabled: Activate the portal to configure your organisation's homepage.

attention.title: Attention to Detail
attention.desc: Every transaction is thoroughly checked: automated verification, fraud detection, and full logging. You get secure, compliant, and traceable payments at every step.

saveTime.title: Save Time
saveTime.desc: Pay in a few clicks with fast integration (API, plugins, payment links). Automate subscription billing, reminders, and reconciliation to stay focused on your business.

control.title: Complete Control
control.desc: Manage everything from a clear dashboard: payments, refunds, disputes, and accounting exports. Set roles, limits, and alerts to stay in control of your cash flow.

support.title: 24/7 Support
support.desc: A team is available anytime to help you, with responsive support and practical guides. If an incident occurs, we stay with you until it’s resolved.

portal.contactSubtitleSection: We'd love to hear from you

message.label: Message
message.placeholder: Tell us more about your inquiry...

info.title: Contact Information
info.subtitle: We'd love to hear from you

welcome.title: Welcome
welcome.paragraph: Découvrez digiKUNTZ Payments, la solution de paiement numérique complète pour les professionnels et les particuliers. Sécurisé, fiable et facile à utiliser, digiKUNTZ Payments vous permet de gérer vos transactions en toute simplicité.

transfer.title: Money Transfer
transfer.subtitle: Send money abroad in just a few clicks.
transfer.description: Fast and secure. Send money abroad in just a few clicks using your mobile wallet or bank card.

fundraising.title: Fundraising
fundraising.subtitle: Create and manage your fundraising campaigns easily.
fundraising.description: Launch fundraising campaigns in minutes. Share your link, receive secure contributions, and track performance in real time.

services.title: Services / Products
services.subtitle: Showcase and sell your services or products online.
services.description: Add your services or products, set your prices, and start receiving secure payments via bank card or mobile wallet.

subscriptionPlan.title: Subscription Plans
subscriptionPlan.subtitle: Create and manage your own subscription plans.
subscriptionPlan.description: Set up customized subscription plans with automatic billing. Manage recurring payments and track your subscribers from your dashboard.

ourMission.title: Our mission
ourMission.description: Facilitating access to digital payments in Africa by offering a simple, secure and reliable platform to transfer money, sell services, manage subscriptions and launch fundraising campaigns.

ourVision.title: Our vision
ourVision.description: To build a connected, inclusive and efficient African financial ecosystem, where every individual, business and developer can collect, pay and innovate without barriers.

customPortal.title: Give your business a fully customizable portal.
customPortal.description: With an Organization account, you get your own portal to showcase products, services, fundraising campaigns, and subscription plans with your branding and content.
customPortal.marquee: Showcase your business with a tailored portal

certs.title: Why choose digiKUNTZ Payments?
certs.subtitle: A payment platform designed for African usage, from individuals to organizations.
items: Secure payments via bank card and mobile wallets
Fast money transfers with status tracking
Online sales for products and services
Payment API for your apps and websites
Centralized dashboard for all financial flows
Detailed history and full transaction traceability

items.q: How can I send money with digiKUNTZ Payments?
items.a: Log in, choose the transfer option, enter recipient details and amount, then confirm payment using your bank card or mobile wallet.

items.q: Can I sell my services or products on the platform?
items.a: Yes. You can create offers, set prices, and receive secure online payments.
You configure a plan with billing cycle and amount. The platform tracks active subscriptions and centralizes payment history.
Yes. Organizations can launch campaigns, share fundraising links, and monitor contributions in real time.

items.q: Are my payments and data secure?
items.a: Yes. Transactions are protected with security and traceability mechanisms to ensure reliable operations.

searchAccount: Search for a user on digiKUNTZ Payments.
